description:
Nnoitra, one of the Espada, suddenly appears and defeats Chad in a single strike. Ichigo, Uryu, and Renji sense Chad`s Spiritual Pressure grow weaker, but they are too far away to help him. Orihime, who is still being held by the Arrancars, also senses Chad`s Spiritual Pressure. At that moment, Ulquiorra enters Orihime`s room and informs her that her friends will soon perish.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sado Yasutora Shisu! Orihime no Namida
Yasutora Sado meurt ! Les larmes d`Orihime
茶渡泰虎死す! 織姫の涙
